resources.string:
Once upon a time there were three frogs.
They lived in a swamp. They had a good time there. a troll too lived in the swamp.
The troll was moody lazy toad, ugly as a tree and grumpy as an old woman.
The frogs were in fact three princes who had been bewitched after they had eaten fungi.
The only thing which could make them princes again was an egg cracked by a dragon
high up in a large mountain far up in the sky. ...
